text: Frédéric Brun (born 18 August 1988) is a French professional racing cyclist who rides for Bourg-en-Bresse Ain. He was named in the start list for the 2015 Tour de France. ==Major results== ;2010 : 10th Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie ;2015 : 5th Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie : 8th Polynormande ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Belfort Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Frédéric Brun (cyclist, born 1988)
